meta.title: Blog & FAQ - Edu.turkish
meta.description: Explore expert articles and guides about the education system in Turkey. We provide in-depth analysis of student visa processes, opportunities for government and university grants, and share real-life tips on living and studying for international students.

hero.title: Blog and
hero.description: Get comprehensive answers to the most relevant questions about 2025 admissions, the specifics of taking TR-YÖS and SAT exams, securing grants, and real-life experiences of international students living in various Turkish cities.

relocationCta.title: Planning to move to Turkey?
relocationCta.description: We help with admission, residence permit, housing and full relocation support.
